course.subject: CENG
course.name: Introduction to Biomicrosystem
course.description: Students not studying in the Department of Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering may enroll in the course upon instructor's approval. Microfabrication technology for biomicrodevice; sensing and characterization techniques for biomicrosystem; surface chemistry and biological compatibility of engineered materials; applications of biomicrosystems (food and environment protection, clinical/medical diagnostics, tissue engineering and controlled release drug delivery).
